biotools.summary: Statistical haplotype reconstruction algorithm targeted for large-scale disease association studies. It is especially suitable for data sets with a large number of subjects and a large number of possibly sparsely located markers.

bioschemas.name: HaploRec
bioschemas.summary: Statistical haplotype reconstruction algorithm targeted for large-scale disease association studies. It is especially suitable for data sets with a large number of subjects and a large number of possibly sparsely located markers.
